body.p: The Guest Additions for Oracle Solaris take the form of a set of device drivers and system applications which may be installed in the guest operating system.
The Solaris Guest Additions will run on VMs running these versions of Solaris. See also .

li.p: Oracle Solaris 11, including Oracle Solaris 11 Express

body.p: The Guest Additions may work with other distributions that are based on comparable software releases.
